alert.note: Alert for Inner Channels from Kupreanof Island to Etolin Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued April 05 at 5:31AM AKDT until April 07 at 12:00AM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...East to southeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Portions of the south-central Inner Channels including Wrangell, Kake, Port Protection, and Point Baker. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning through Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Aviation and marine transportation could be impacted. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The storm appears to have slowed its progress northward. Therefore, the time period when gusts will be highest is most likely late Wednesday afternoon through early Wednesday evening.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Inner Channels from Kupreanof Island to Etolin Island
